directions: In a small bowl combine red onion, lime juice, olive oil, pinch of salt and pepper. Let them marinate at least 5 minutes to mellow the flavor of the onion.
In a large bowl combine chopped shrimp, avocado, tomato, jalape√±o. Combine all the ingredients together, add cilantro and gently toss. Adjust salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: 1 lb jumbo cooked shrimp, peeled and deveined, chopped*
salt and fresh pepper to taste
title: Zesty Lime Shrimp and Avocado Salad
